value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Terran Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: A new and hopefully improved version of my guides for each race where I go over as many basics as possible while doing it live :)  I strongly believe that a super structured guide style is not very helpful compared to watching/playing the game actively.  Feedback is greatly appreciated. -- Watch live
